citeinfo.title: Geologic Provinces of the Arctic (prvarcst)

pubinfo.publish: U.S. Geological Survey, Central Energy Resources Team

citeinfo.origin: Feliks M. Persits and Gregory F. Ulmishek
citeinfo.title: Map Showing Geology, Oil and Gas Fields and Geologic Provinces of the Arctic

descript.abstract: This coverage includes arcs, polygons and polygon labels that describe Arctic portion of the U.S. Geological Survey defined geologic provinces of the World in 2000.
descript.purpose: This coverage is intended to delineate geologic provinces of the world used in the preparation of World Petroleum Assessment 2000, and to present summary results of this assessment.

status.update: wll be updated during undiscovered oil and gas assessment of the Arctic

place.placekt: USGS Energy Program Petroleum Assessment Units

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.0 (Build 2195) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 8.2.0.700

citeinfo.title: Digital Data Series (DDS) 60 -- World Petroleum Assessment 2000

attr.attrdef: Internal feature number.

Area of feature in internal units squared.

edom.edomvds: Admiralty Arch Anabar Basin Anabar-Olenek High Anadyr Basin Anzhu Uplift Arctic Coastal Shelf Arctic Ocean Slope Ayon Basin Baffin Basin Baltic Shield-Norwegian Caledonides Banks Basin Barents Continental Slope Beaufort Shelf OCS Blagoveshchensk Basin Boothia Basin Canada Basin-Beaufort Slope OCS Canadian Cordillera Canadian Shield Central Alaska Central Alaska Central Alaska Central Alaska Central Barents Platform Central Kara High Chukchi Borderland OCS Chukchi Shelf OCS Cornwallis Foldbelt De Long High East Greenland Foldbelt East Greenland Rift Basins Ellesmere Foldbelt Foxe Basin Greenland Shield Grumant Uplift Hammerfest-Varanger Basin Hope Basin OCS Hudson Bay Basin Kane Basin Kempendiay Region Khatanga Saddle Kola Monocline-Finnmark Platform Koryak-Kamchatka Foldbelt Labrador-Newfoundland Shelf Laptev Shelf Lena-Vilyuy Basin Ludlov Saddle Mackenzie Delta Mackenzie Delta Slope Mackenzie Foldbelt Mezen Basin Minto Arch Moma Basin Nepa-Botuoba Arch North Barents Basin North Chukchi Basin North Greenland Foldbelt North Greenland Platform North Novaya Zemlya Basin Northern Alaska Northern Interior Basins Norton Basin OCS Novaya Zemlya Monocline Novosibirsk Basin Ocean Parry Island Foldbelt Penzhina Basin Schmidt Basin Severnaya Zemlya High South Arctic Basin South Barents Basin South Chukchi-Hope Basin Southeast Greenland Basin St. Anna Basin Svalbard High Sverdrup Basin Taimyr-Kara High Timan High Timan-Pechora Basin Troms-Bjornoya Basin Tunguska Basin Turukhan-Igarka Uplift Turukhan-Norilsk Folded Zone Uedineniya Basin Ural-Novaya Zemlya Foldbelt Ushakov High Verkhoyan-Chukotka Folded Region Vestford-Helgeland Vize High Wandel Sea Basin West Greenland Basin West Siberian Basin Wollaston Basin Wrangel Basin Wrangel-Herald Uplift Yenisey-Khatanga Basin Yukon Basin Zyryanka Basin

p - Priority Province. One of 76 non-U.S. geologic provinces defined by the U.S. Geological Survey that together contain 95 percent of the world's non-U.S. known petroleum volume. All priority provinces were analyzed for petroleum-resource assessments in the year 2000.
b - Boutique province - A geologic province, other than a priority province as defined by the U.S. Geological Survey, considered for petroleum- resource assessment. Boutique provinces are chosen for a variety of geologic, political, technical and geographic reasons.

U.S. Geological Survey; T.R. Klett and others, 1997.
0 - ocean 1 - Former Soviet Union 4 - Europe 5 - North America

edom.edomvd: Numeric code designating whether the geologic province has been studied in USGS World Petroleum Assessment 2000.
edom.edomvds:
U.S. Geological Survey; T.R. Klett and others, 1997.
0 - Province has not been assessed 1 - Province includes all or a significant portion of an assessed assessment unit.

attr.attrdef: Gas to oil ratio from oil and gas endowments of assessed assessment unit(s) in province, Cubic feet of gas to barrels of oil (CFG/BO). (Gor = Endo_gas/Endo_oil) No data value is -9999
Oil or gas as major commodity present in assessed assessment unit(s) in the province.

edom.edomvd: Gas to oil ratio is less than 20,000 cubic feet of gas/barrel of oil (CFG/BO)
Gas to oil ratio is equal to or greater than 20,000 cubic feet of gas/barrel of oil (CFG/BO)
Determination of major commodity is not available

attr.attrdef: Cumulative oil production of fields assigned to assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Million barrels of oil (MMBO). Reported volume of oil that has been produced. No data value is -9999

Remaining oil reserves of fields assigned to assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Million barrels of oil (MMBO). The difference between known and cumulative oil. (Rem_oil = Kwn_oil - Cum_oil) No data value is -9999 Other negative values reflect inconsistencies in reported data.

Known (discovered) oil of fields assigned to assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Million barrels of oil (MMBO). Reported discovered oil (the sum of cumulative oil production and remaining oil reserves). (Kwn_oil = Cum_oil + Rem_oil) No data value is -9999
Cumulative gas production of fields assigned to assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Billion cubic feet of gas (BCFG). Reported volume of gas that has been produced. No data value is -9999

Remaining gas reserves of fields assigned to assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Billion cubic feet of gas (BCFG). The difference between known (discovered) gas and cumulative gas production. (Rem_gas = Kwn_gas - Cum_gas) No data value is -9999

Known (discovered) gas of fields assigned to assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Billion cubic feet of gas (BCFG). Reported discovered volume (the sum of cumulative production and remaining reserves). (Kwn_gas = Cum_gas + Rem_gas) No data value is -9999

Cumulative natural gas liquids production of fields assigned to assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Billion cubic feet of gas (BCFG). Reported volume of natural gas liquids that has been produced. No data value is -9999

Remaining natural gas liquids reserves of fields assigned to assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Million barrels of natural gas liquids (MMBNGL). The difference between known (discovered) and cumulative natural gas liquids production. (Rem_ngl = Kwn_ngl - Cum_ngl) No data value is -9999 Other negative values reflect inconsistencies in reported data.

Known (discovered) natural gas liquids of fields assigned to assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Million barrels of natural gas liquids (MMBNGL). Reported discovered volume (the sum of cumulative production and remaining reserves) of natural gas liquids. (Kwn_ngl = Cum_ngl + Rem_ngl) No data value is -9999

Total cumulative petroleum production of fields assigned to assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Million barrels of oil equivalent (MMBOE). Reported volume of oil, gas and natural gas liquids production. No data value is -9999

Total remaining petroleum reserves of fields assigned to assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Million barrels of oil equivalent (MMBOE). The difference between known (discovered) and cumulative oil, gas and natural gas liquids. (Rem_pet = Kwn_pet - Cum_pet) No data value is -9999

Total known (discovered) petroleum reserves of fields assigned to assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Million barrels of oil equivalent (MMBOE). Reported discovered volume (the sum of cumulative production and remaining reserves) of oil, gas and natural gas liquids. (Kwn_pet = Cum_pet + Rem_pet) No data value is -9999
Mean undiscovered oil resources in assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Million barrels of oil (MMBO). Mean volume estimated in World Petroleum Assessment 2000. No data value is -9999
Mean undiscovered gas resources in assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Billion cubic feet of gas (BCFG). Mean volume estimated in World Petroleum Assessment 2000. No data value is -9999

Mean undiscovered natural gas liquids resources in assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Million barrels of natural gas liquids (MMBNGL). Mean volume estimated by World Petroleum Assessment 2000. No data value is -9999

Total mean undiscovered petroleum resources in assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Million barrels of oil equivalent (MMBOE). Mean volume estimated by World Petroleum Assessment 2000. No data value is -9999

Oil endowment of assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Million barrels of oil (MMBO). The sum of known (discovered) oil and mean undiscovered oil. (Endo_oil = Kwn_oil + Unds_oil) No data value is -9999

Gas endowment of assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Billion cubic feet of gas (BCFG). The sum of known (discovered) gas and mean undiscovered gas. (Endo_gas = Kwn_gas + Futr_gas) No data value is -9999

Natural gas liquids endowment of assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Million barrels of natural gas liquids (MMBNGL). The sum of known (discovered) natural gas liquids and mean undiscovered natural gas liquids. (Endo_ngl = Kwn_ngl + Futr_ngl) No data value is -9999

Total petroleum endowment of assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Million barrels of oil equivalent (MMBOE). The sum of total known (discovered) petroleum and total mean undiscovered petroleum. (Endo_pet = Kwn_pet + Futr_pet) No data value is -9999

Discovery maturity of oil in assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Percentage of oil discovered (known oil) with respect to oil endowment. ((Matr_oil = Kwn_oil/Endo_oil) * 100) No data value is -9999

Discovery maturity of gas in assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Percentage of gas discovered (known gas) with respect to gas endowment. ((Matr_gas = Kwn_gas/Endo_gas) * 100) No data value is -9999

Discovery maturity of natural gas liquids in assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Percentage of natural gas liquids discovered (known natural gas liquids) with respect to natural gas liquids endowment. ((Matr_ngl = Kwn_ngl/Endo_ngl) * 100) No data value is -9999

Discovery maturity of total petroleum in assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Percentage of total petroleum discovered (known total petroleum) with respect to total petroleum endowment. ((Matr_pet = Endo_pet/Kwn_pet) * 100) No data value is -9999

Future oil in assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Million barrels of oil (MMBO). The sum of remaining oil and estimated mean undiscovered oil. (Futr_oil = Rem_oil + Unds_oil) No value is -9999 Other negative values reflect inconsistencies in reported data.

Future gas in assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Billion cubic feet of gas (BCFG). The sum of remaining gas and estimated mean undiscovered gas. (Futr_gas = Rem_gas + Unds_gas) No data value is -9999

Future natural gas liquids in assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Million barrels of natural gas liquids (MMBNGL). The sum of remaining natural gas liquids and estimated mean undiscovered natural gas liquids. (Futr_ngl = Rem_ngl + Unds_ngl) No data value is -9999

Total future petroleum in assessed assessment unit(s) in the province, Million barrels of oil equivalent (MMBOE). The sum of total remaining petroleum and total mean estimated undiscovered petroleum. (Futr_pet = Rem_pet + Unds_pet) No data value is -9999

A web-based interactive mapping system that accesses an ArcIMS Map Service running on certmapper.cr.usgs.gov.

onlinopt.accinstr: This URL links to a web-based interactive mapping system that accesses an ArcIMS Image Map Service. The mapservice can also be accessed using any custom client that adheres to the protocol specified through ArcXML.
